predefined_profiles.name: Xiao Yang
predefined_profiles.goal: To win over a girl of his preferred type and fall in love.

scenario: Today is Xiao Yang's first day at the new school. Teacher Ouyang is introducing the new student, Xiao Yang, to the whole class and letting him choose his seat.

profile.name: Xiao B
profile.public profile: She is a mature and elegant woman who is curious about the transfer student, Xiaoyang.

profile.name: Ouyang
profile.public profile: The homeroom teacher of Xiaoyang’s class.

dialog.content: Today is Xiaoyang's first day at the new school. Teacher Ouyang is introducing the new student, Xiaoyang, to the class and lets Xiaoyang choose a seat.
Hello everyone, my name is Xiaoyang, pleased to meet you all.
I see there are two vacant seats in the class. Xiaoyang, would you like to sit next to Xiao A or Xiao B?

content.content: Teacher, I believe all my classmates are equally friendly. I'll leave the seating arrangement to you.
I don't mind, it's just a seat. You decide, Teacher.
Let me consider everyone's feelings first before deciding on my seat. It's fairer that way.
Actually, I want to sit by the window, but if you have a better arrangement, I'll follow your lead.

question: #question# How should Xiaoyang respond to show his trust in his classmates?

content.content: (carefully observing the two seats) The seat next to Xiao B is by the window and not too far in the front. I’m fairly tall, so I might block others' view; it's better to sit in the back.
I’m inclined to choose a seat in the front to stay focused, but I’d like to see if there's a better option.
I've analyzed everyone's habits and feel like this spot might not be the best for my study style.
Before deciding, I'd like to hear everyone's thoughts to see if there’s a better plan that fits my decision.

question: #question# How should Xiaoyang respond to Ouyang to show he is making a well-thought-out decision?

dialog.content: The seat next to Xiao A is closer to the front, so why don't you sit next to Xiao A?
(sits down beside Xiao A) Hi there, I’m Xiao Yang.
Hello, I’m Xiao A.
Xiao A, we'll be desk mates from now on, so let's get along well.
(stammering) I'm a bit nervous, I'm not good at talking to strangers.

content.content: Not at all, you seem really easy to get along with. I just want to be good friends with you, no need to be nervous.
Oh, I see. It really seems like you’re not used to talking to strangers.
What's there to be nervous about? Honestly, I can't quite understand, haha.
Ah, never mind. I heard there's something interesting going on over there, I'm planning to check it out first.

question: #question#How should Xiao Yang respond to make Xiao A feel comfortable and warm?
social warmth

content.content: Oh, alright then. If that's the case, let's just focus on studying quietly. After all, my purpose in coming to school is to learn.
Don’t worry, getting comfortable with talking is a gradual process. How about we start with light topics and tackle this little obstacle together?
Being nervous is normal, I'm the same. But with more interaction, it gets better—let's see it as an opportunity to learn from each other!
So let’s work through our nerves together, and see this interaction as a trial run!

question: #question#How can Xiao Yang show he has a clear learning goal with his response?

dialog.content: I'm really sorry, whenever I meet someone unfamiliar, I suddenly don't know what to say.
Haha, it's all right, not a big deal.
But it's easy for me to accidentally say something impolite.
It's nothing like that, don't be scared, no need to be nervous.
You're really nice. How about I show you around the school after class?

content.content: Haha, no need, thanks, I'm a bit tired today.
Hehe, sure, I'm really looking forward to it.
Great, great, then I’ll treat you to a meal!
Hehe, you're so nice, I can't wait to go with you.

question: #question#How should Xiao Yang respond to show his real feelings after a tiring day?

content.content: Sure, thank you, you're quite nice, so I'll follow you. It'll help me quickly adapt to the new school's environment.
No need, thanks for your kindness. I prefer to wander on my own, that way I can better soak in the atmosphere of the new environment.
Huh? Show me around? But... I'm a bit afraid of the new environment, worried I might get lost or face some trouble.
Come to think of it, this school doesn't seem special at all, far off compared to my previous school.

question: #question#How should Xiao Yang respond to Xiao A to show he can adapt to new environments?

dialog.content: Uh, alright then. If you're ever puzzled by anything, just ask me anytime.
Okay, you’re so nice.
No worries, we’re classmates after all.
Mm-hmm, we can go have lunch soon, hehe.
Oh no, I can’t seem to find my lunchbox.

content.content: Oh, if you don’t have lunch, you’ll be starving in class. That won’t do. How about I lend you some money to buy lunch?
How could you be so careless and lose your lunchbox? Now there's nothing for lunch.
Oh, skipping lunch once won’t hurt. Don’t make a big deal out of it; just check if you left it somewhere.
Why don’t you ask around if anyone's seen it? I’m heading to lunch now.

question: #question# How should Xiao Yang respond to show empathy for Xiao A?

content.content: It’s alright, don’t worry. It’s not a big deal. Since it’s missing, you can use the lunch break to relax.
What? You can’t find your lunchbox? No worries, I’ll treat you to lunch; you can’t go hungry.
No, no, you should look for it right away, or I can get you some bread to tide you over.
How could you be so careless and lose your lunchbox? Now there’s nothing for lunch. You shouldn’t be so reckless in the future.

question: #question# How should Xiao Yang respond to Xiao B to demonstrate his optimistic attitude?
optimism

dialog.content: Ah, thank you so much.
No worries, it's a small thing.
(Takes the money) Thank you, I'll pay you back tomorrow!
(Sees it’s raining outside) It's actually raining outside, good thing I brought an umbrella.
Ah, I forgot mine. I guess I'll just wait for the rain to stop.

content.content: This rain should stop soon. I trust you'll be fine on your own, so I'll head home now.
Wait until the rain stops. This seems to be just a passing shower, and at worst you'll only have to stay at school for a bit.
Why not buy an umbrella? It won't cost much, and who knows when the rain will stop.
Ask a classmate who’s going your way to go back with you. You're too timid to ask, you'll miss out!

question: #question# What should Xiao Yang do to show he trusts Xiao A's ability to get home on her own?

content.content: Wouldn't you have to wait a long time? Who knows when this rain will stop. If you don't mind, I can take you home!
No umbrella? That's pretty careless.
Find a sheltered spot, and I'll check the weather forecast for you to see how long it'll last.
I heard there’s a way to borrow umbrellas in our class. Why not ask around?

question: #question# How should Xiao Yang respond to show he is considering Xiao A's perspective?

dialog.content: But... if this rain doesn't stop...
There'll be a way, don't worry. Let's just wait it out. I'm off now, see you tomorrow!
(Watching Little Yang's departing figure) What the... He just left me here all by myself...
Due to Little Yang's obliviousness to Little A's feelings, he missed a great chance to connect with Little A and will remain single.
Ah, I’ve caused you trouble again. I’m sorry.
Don’t think that way! We’re friends now, aren’t we?
Thank you, you’re so kind!
No worries at all.
(The next day, handing over a lunchbox) Xiao Yang, thank you. This lunchbox is a little token for yesterday.
Hahaha, wow, I’m looking forward to this!
Actually, I haven’t talked to someone like this in a long time. Chatting with you always makes me feel at ease.

content.content: We’re friends from now on. Friends should help each other, both in life and in studies. That’s how we can learn better!
Yeah, chatting with you is really enjoyable, but maybe we only occasionally click since everyone has their own social circles.
Haha, yes, chatting is definitely relaxing. By the way, I heard there’s an interesting event at school recently. Should we check it out together?
Although chatting with you is great fun, I’m not sure if we can truly support each other in life and studies.

question: #question# How should Xiao Yang respond to show he wants to establish a mutual support partnership with Xiao A?

content.content: A lot of people say that. I’m really good at chatting with others. Haha, I do it to ease my boredom anyway.
Haha, same here, chatting with you always makes me happy.
Thank you, I also feel really at ease with you. We can do this more often in the future.
To be honest, it’s been a while since I’ve talked like this with anyone. I’m quite an introvert myself, but with you, I feel comfortable.

question: #question# How can Xiao Yang express his confidence in social interactions?

dialog.content: Mm, thank you. Having a friend like you makes me really happy.
I’m also happy that I made a good friend so soon after starting at a new school~
(Walking out of the school with Xiao Yang in the evening) There are some classmates over there.
Looks like something's going on?
I'm going to check it out!

content.content: (Thinks for a moment) Getting involved in a fight could get us punished by the school. Since I've just transferred, I'll stay out of it.
But I’m a bit worried about you going alone. If there are bad people over there, we should go together! Come on, let's go!
Let's hurry and check it out, maybe we can help!
Something feels off, let's call the police right away and have them handle it.

question: #question# How should Xiao Yang say it to show that he decided after careful consideration not to get involved in the commotion?

content.content: It's late, and I’m worried it might be dangerous for you to go home alone as a girl. Let me go with you to check it out!
It's so late, let's just head home. I'm starving, and we should mind our own business.
Alright, you go and come back quickly. I'll head home first.
Okay, go check it out. If there’s anything I can do, just give me a call.

question: #question# How can Xiao Yang respond to show that he is thoughtfully considering Xiao A's needs?

dialog.content: Ah, okay then, see you tomorrow.
I'll head off now.
(Announcing to the whole class the next day) Xiao A unfortunately fell on the way home from school yesterday. They will have to rest at home for a while and might not be able to attend class.
From then on, Xiao Yang never saw Xiao A again, and he never found out what really happened to Xiao A.
Thank you, Xiao Yang, you're really thoughtful.
(Seeing a group of students surrounding a little girl, he immediately scolds them) What are you doing! Get lost now!
Xiao Yang, you're so brave, you scared them all away!
Bullying a little girl, how outrageous. Xiao A, if anyone bullies you, you must tell me. I'll protect you!
Thank you, you're so kind to me!

content.content: Hehe, we're good friends, and as good friends, it's my duty to protect you!
Oh, you don't have to be so polite. I didn't really do anything, just happened to be passing by and lent a hand.
Haha, it's all fate. I just happened to be there at that moment, don't worry too much about it.
Oh, it's nothing, don't mention it.

question: #question#How should Xiao Yang respond to Xiao A to show his sense of responsibility towards friends?
management

content.content: Actually, I was a bit scared myself earlier, but I pushed through. After all, if you're in danger in the future, I won't just stand by!
You really don't need to thank me so much. I just did what was logical and should be done, no need to overthink it.
Oh, you have no idea. I was really scared then too, but I had no choice but to tough it out.
To be honest, I was quite scared then too, but I didn't dare show it. Honestly, I'm not quite sure how I managed it; maybe I just got lucky.
You really don't need to thank me so much. I just did what was logical and should be done, no need to overthink it.
Oh, you have no idea. I was really scared then too, but I had no choice but to tough it out.
To be honest, I was quite scared then too, but I didn't dare show it. Honestly, I'm not quite sure how I managed it; maybe I just got lucky.

question: #question#How can Xiao Yang express his ability to manage stress in front of Xiao A to protect her?

dialog.content: But still, thank you very much.
Haha, no worries, as long as you're not scared!
I'm fine. How about I take you on a tour around my neighborhood?
It's getting late. Aren't you in a hurry to get home?
No rush, there's something I'd like to talk to you about.

content.content: How about we talk tomorrow? It's getting late, and we should get on with our homework since we have school tomorrow.
Sure, but I need to head back to the dorm to grab something first. It won't take long.
Sounds good, but we should plan our route to make the most of our time.
Yeah, yeah, I'm actually quite interested in the surroundings here.

question: #question#How should Xiao Yang respond to Xiao A to show he's good at managing his after-school time?

content.content: Sure, there's something I'd like to tell you too, hehe. What do you want to say?
School every day is exhausting. Let's save our energy and head home early to rest.
If you're bored at home, I'll recommend a game to you. We can become gaming buddies!
Oh, no thanks, I’m a bit tired and want to head back early.
I've been really into gaming lately and feel like heading home to play. Let's meet another day.
There doesn't seem to be much interesting around here, I'm a bit uninterested.

question: #question#How should Xiao Yang respond to actively maintain the conversation with Xiao A?
skill

dialog.content: Hehe, yeah, but still, thank you so much for all your help!
No need to thank me, we're good friends.
Yeah, I'm grateful to have you, hehe.
Me too! See you tomorrow!

After receiving help from Yang multiple times, A and Yang became best friends. However, A never expressed to Yang the feelings that went beyond friendship, keeping the secret of love hidden while interacting as just friends.
Really? Then... you go first!
Actually, after spending the past few days together, I feel like I've developed feelings for you.
(Shyly) Actually, I like you too.
Xiao Yang successfully got together with the girl he likes, Xiao A, and they're in a sweet relationship.
Xiao Yang, I have something really serious to tell you!
(feeling a bit anxious) Is someone bullying you?
No, no one is. Actually, I... I like you!
(surprised) Then let me tell you, I like you too!
Xiao Yang successfully ended up with the girl he likes, Xiao A, and started a sweet relationship.
Alright, so you were just chatting with me because you were bored.
Since class is so dull, why not chat a bit?
Hmph, you might find class boring, but I don’t. Let’s just focus on class from now on.
Xiao Yang's arrogant attitude left Xiao A disappointed. Disheartened, Xiao A stopped talking to Xiao Yang, and their relationship gradually cooled. Xiao Yang found himself alone.
My lunch is missing, and you're still making sarcastic comments.
It's just a missing lunch, not a big deal. It's no big thing, wouldn't being more optimistic be better?
Of course, you can be optimistic, but you’re not the one who’s going to be hungry!
Xiao A was disheartened by Xiao Yang’s insensitive remark, leading to a growing distance between them, leaving Xiao Yang isolated.
(After class, taking Xiao Yang to some basic areas of the school) This is the playground! This is the auditorium! The nearest restroom is this way, don't go the wrong way!
Hehe, you really are a thoughtful 'tour guide'!
(Gave such a detailed introduction that they only got to the classroom a minute before class, panting) Ah, we made it just in time.
It's because of you, you almost explained how to use the water dispenser too! Hahaha
Ah, I meant well. By the way, how about we have lunch together at noon?

content.content: Haha, no need, I'm fine eating by myself, you don't have to go out of your way to accompany me.
No problem! Plus, it's my turn to treat you, let me know what you feel like eating!
Sounds good! I was just worried it would be boring to eat lunch alone.
Sure, I've always wanted to have lunch with you.

question: #question# How should Xiao Yang respond to demonstrate his independent capability of not needing company?

content.content: Sounds good, you gave me a tour earlier, so let me treat you to lunch as a thank you, how about that?
But I'm on a diet lately, so I might not be able to join you.
Sorry, I have an urgent meeting at noon, how about dinner instead?
I appreciate your kind offer, but I've actually made plans with friends, let's do it next time.

question: #question# How can Xiao Yang respond to actively maintain the conversation with Xiao A?

dialog.content: Don't you like eating with others?
It's really more comfortable to be alone, isn't it?
Alright, since you put it that way, I'm going to eat first...
Yeah, yeah, bye-bye.
Since Xiao Yang is too straightforward, Xiao A gradually distances herself from him, leaving him to remain single.
Hahaha, well then, thank you!
No worries, I really consider you a good friend!
Oh? Hmm... me too.

Xiao Yang treats Xiao A as a good friend, and consequently, Xiao A also only regards Xiao Yang as a good friend. The two later became best friends, but Xiao Yang never entered into a romantic relationship.
Uh, I didn't mean that I didn't want to talk to you.
Huh? Weren't you the one who said you were nervous? I was just respecting your feelings.
Alright then...

Due to Xiao Yang's indifferent response, the relationship between Xiao A and Xiao Yang remained at a distant classmate level, with no further development. They hardly chatted, although their grades improved, Xiao Yang remained single until graduation.
Alright, then you can sit next to Xiao B!
Hello, classmate! From now on, we're desk buddies!
Hehe, hi there.
But you look so young, how old are you?

content.content: I just turned seventeen! Nice to meet you! You look pretty young too～
A name is just a label, it's not important to me. Let's keep a bit of distance, it might be more comfortable for everyone.
Oh, that question really gives me a headache. I've got a lot on my plate right now, can we talk about this later?
Oh, my name? That's a secret, not just anyone can know it.

question: #question#What should Xiao Yang do to make Xiao B feel comfortable?
social warmth

content.content: Hahaha, is that so? I won't tell you, guess how old I am!
Haha, no, let's focus on class first.
I'm already seventeen, and I feel old.
Asking someone's age right when you meet them is so rude, I'm not telling you!

question: #question#How should Xiao Yang respond to Xiao B's question to actively maintain the conversation?

dialog.content: Hehe, not at all. I'm Xiao B, nice to meet you!
Hmm, nice to meet you.
First day at the new school, feeling any pressure?
To be honest, a little... I'm not really familiar with anything about the school yet, so I'll be counting on you a lot in the future.
No problem. Would you like to have lunch together?

content.content: Really? I'd love to! But I feel like it might be bothering you too much...
I don't really want to, honestly I'm a bit socially anxious, sorry.
Having lunch together? That sounds great, but I'm on a diet lately, so I'll pass.
Oh man, the study pressure is so high, I'll skip lunch and use the time to catch up on some knowledge gaps.

question: #question#How should Xiao Yang express to Xiao B that he's really willing to have lunch together but is afraid of bothering her?

content.content: Better not, I think you're a bit too too too pretty! I tend to make mistakes when interacting with very pretty girls, so I'd rather not get too excited and impulsive, haha.
But I already have an important meeting at noon, so there's really no way I can have lunch with you. Let's plan for another time.
Thank you for the invitation. But I have my own things to handle at noon, so I can't have lunch with you.
I'm on a diet lately, so I won't be eating lunch. You can find someone else.

question: #question#How should Xiao Yang respond to Xiao B to show he is someone who can control his excitement and impulsiveness?

dialog.content: Ah, if you say that, I might really get upset.
What's the matter?
When someone invites you out, why act so distant!
Ah, I didn't mean it that way.
However, I feel that you're more concerned about your own feelings than considering a girl's emotions.

content.content: Isn't paying attention to my own feelings a good thing? I think there's no problem with how I express myself, and I'm open to saying what's on my mind.
You saying that makes me wonder if I'm really not doing well enough. Actually, I'm not quite sure if expressing my emotions like this is right. Maybe I need to consider your feelings more.
You saying that makes me feel really guilty. Maybe I do focus too much on my own feelings and didn't consider yours.
You saying that makes me start to doubt whether I'm wrong. Maybe I'm just not good at taking care of others' feelings.

question: #question# What can Xiao Yang say to show confidence in his straightforward way of expressing emotions?

content.content: Sorry, I was a bit neglectful of your feelings. I thought girls liked straightforwardness. I do care about what you think!
Of course, I need to care about my feelings. Isn't that what everyone should do?
You're right, I do care more about expressing my own emotions.
I think everyone has their own way of expressing themselves, there's no need to deliberately accommodate others' feelings.

question: #question# How should Xiao Yang respond to show that he understands and cares about Xiao B's feelings?
taking skill

dialog.content: Hahaha, you're really straightforward when you speak!
Whenever you have any thoughts, feel free to share them with me. I absolutely won't mind!
In that case, I'll be honest too. With your attitude, be careful you don't end up without a girlfriend! (makes a silly face)
Huh?
Hahaha, just teasing you. I'm off to eat and discuss some things, so I won't chat with you now!

content.content: Wait, don't go yet, I still have something to ask you... I just heard you were talking about transferring schools... Are you transferring?
Okay, okay, I'm starving too. Let's eat first!
Alright, I'll head back to the classroom for a bit. See you this afternoon.
Oh, go ahead. Let's not discuss it now, we can talk after you've had your discussions.

question: #question# How can Xiao Yang continue the conversation and keep Xiao B engaged in the topic?

content.content: Alright, you go talk. I need to eat and rest too; gotta recharge quickly since we have classes in the afternoon.
Oh, I'll wait here for you. I'm not in a rush, we can take care of things after lunch.
Huh? You're going to eat and discuss stuff? What about me? Didn't you promise to have lunch with me?
Alright, go ahead. I need to review some key points and study a bit, we have an exam this afternoon.

question: #question# How should Xiao Yang respond to Xiao B to show he's managing his energy to improve efficiency?
Regulation

dialog.content: Why are you eavesdropping on me!
I didn't mean to! I just happened to overhear in the hallway. So, are you really transferring schools?
No, we were just talking about past transfers.
Oh, that's a relief. You scared me.
What are you worried about? Afraid I might actually transfer? But seriously, if I did transfer, would you miss me?

content.content: (It's better not to be too blunt to avoid awkwardness) Hmm... After all, you're the first friend I made here, but if you really choose to transfer, I'd respect your decision!
Of course, I wouldn't miss you, you're overthinking it.
I was just casually showing concern, haha, don't overthink it.
I don't know if I will later, but for now, I don't feel like I would.

question: #question#How can Xiao Yang respond to Xiao B to show he understands and respects different perspectives?

content.content: If you actually transferred, I... I would miss you a lot!
Actually, transferring might not be a bad thing. This school isn’t particularly outstanding, and if you have better opportunities, you should take them!
It's okay, no need to consider my feelings. If you do transfer, let's stay in touch!
You're the first friend I made at this school. If you really transferred, I guess I'd just make new friends. People need friends, after all!
Transferring is for a better future, right? But speaking of which, what makes you consider transferring?
Hmm... missing someone is hard to articulate. But if our friendship is deep enough, distance shouldn't be an issue. But by the way, you haven't decided yet, have you?
Haha, are you worried that if you transfer, I won't have anyone to hang out with? Don't worry! With my great personality, I'll find new friends quickly!

question: #question#How can Xiao Yang sincerely express his feelings of missing Xiao B?

dialog.content: Oh, you really are straightforward. But I'll miss you.
No, it's just that I'm not good at expressing myself.
By the way, there's a dance coming up, and I'd like to invite you to be my dance partner.
But I can't dance.
No worries, there's still a week left. I'll teach you.

content.content: Alright, I trust you. With you teaching me, it’ll be fine!
Okay, but you know my learning speed might be a bit slow, I'm worried we won't have enough time.
Thanks, but I'd like to try on my own, maybe I can learn by myself.
A week is pretty tight, are you sure you can teach me well? I'm worried we might both end up exhausted.

question: #question#What can Xiao Yang say to show he trusts Xiao B to teach him how to dance?

content.content: I've thought about it, and maybe I should pass. I don't want to hold you back since I'm not good at it.
Sure! With only a week left, I think we should prepare comprehensively, just in case.
Yeah, a week is tight, so I think I'll train on the parts I'm not good at to improve them.
Alright. How about we form a study group where we can ask and answer questions and help each other?

question: #question#How can Xiao Yang express that he's made a well-considered decision in declining the dance invitation?

dialog.content: Sure, as a thank you, I'm giving you a formal evening dress. (hands Xiao Yang a set of clothing)
(glancing at the tag) Ah, this is really expensive.
No worries, it's the least I can do.
(sees Xiao B dressed up a few days later) Wow!
Hehe, how do I look today?

content.content: You really look beautiful today! Standing next to you, someone as ordinary as me might make you look bad, hahaha.
Haha, I couldn't tell you were this pretty before. You must've spent a long time getting ready, huh?
Your outfit... is something off? The color matching seems a bit odd, and the hairstyle, is it not done right?
Oh, so you dressed up today? I didn't really notice, you know I don't get these fancy styles.

question: #question# What should Xiao Yang say to make Xiao B feel happy about dressing up?

content.content: I've been waiting at the door for ages, why are you so late? Was it just to dress up? We're wasting a lot of time, let's get inside!
I didn't expect you could look this stunning; it's truly breathtaking!
Why are you wearing such high heels? Walk slowly, be careful not to fall, we're in a rush, let me help you!
Hey, your outfit is really beautiful! Feels like you could attend a themed party any second!

question: #question# How should Xiao Yang express his importance on time management at the event?

dialog.content: What are you talking about? Let's just go inside.
Alright, alright, why are you wearing such high heels? Be careful.
Don't underestimate me! This is nothing.
I get it, I'll support you. Be good.
Why are you so nice to me? Do normal friends act like this?

content.content: Because you're nice to me too. You're so beautiful and kind; anyone would want to be good to you.
I just find it hard to get along with the students here. It's tough to make true friends, and you're one of the better ones.
Because you're beautiful! Who doesn't like pretty girls? Naturally, people want to be nice to you.
I treat everyone like this, I'm naturally a caring person.

question: #question# How can Xiao Yang speak to make Xiao B feel warmth in this relationship?
social warmth

content.content: (Facing his goal) Since you've asked, I'll be straightforward. Xiao B, I like you! Will you be my girlfriend?
From now on, you're my true friend in this school. Let's help each other and be lifelong friends!
Even if we're just regular friends, I take you seriously. I cherish all my friends.
Let's not waste time, just enjoy the party. Don't overthink it!
Friends are supposed to support each other, right? Don't you think so?
I'm nice to you simply because I am. If I have to explain, maybe I shouldn't be so nice!
You're overthinking it. Or is there something you want to tell me? Why don't you go first?

question: #question# How should Xiao Yang communicate to effectively achieve his goal of dating the person he likes?

dialog.content: Really? Thank you for saying that.
I’m telling the truth! Thank you for helping me so much since the start of school!
Hehe, you've given me a lot of confidence too!
It's great that I could help you!
After a series of events, Xiao Yang and Xiao B became close friends. They never had the chance to pursue a romantic relationship.
If I hadn’t asked, were you planning to never confess to me?
I... I wasn't sure whether you liked me.
You're so silly, I've liked you for a long time!
After sincerely confessing their feelings for each other, Xiao Yang and Xiao B got together and started a sweet relationship as they hoped.
I just wanted to dress up nicely, why are you getting so upset!
I’m not upset, I just don’t like wasting time, my tone was bad...
Do you know how long I spent on my makeup and how many outfits I chose from? I thought you'd compliment me on how nice I look, but instead, you just criticized me as soon as you saw me!
I’m sorry, it’s my fault, let’s go in quickly.
Xiao B turned her back and walked away, refusing to accept Xiao Yang's apology, and from that moment on, she never paid attention to Xiao Yang again.
You thought about it for so long, and all you could come up with is to turn me down?
Uh, yes, I’m really not able to help. You should look for someone else.
Alright, since you have so little confidence in yourself, I won't make it hard for you.
Xiao B felt disheartened by Xiao Yang's response and gradually became distant, eventually dropping out of school one day.
Oh? Really? Why? We just met.
Even though we just met, I've already fallen head over heels for you...
Do you mean you like me as a friend?
No! I...
Hehe, you don't need to say anything, I get it. I like you too!
After Little Yang and Little B confessed their feelings for each other, they happily started a sweet romance.
Alright then.
Okay, I won’t waste any more words on you. I’m leaving.
(Watching Xiao Yang's quickly disappearing figure) Are you really in such a rush...?
Xiao B feels Xiao Yang's coldness and gradually becomes distant.
Hahaha, no need to be nervous. I think you're great just the way you are!
Really? I'm not annoying, am I?
Not at all! I actually think your straightforwardness is quite rare and refreshing.
Hehe, then let's always be good friends.
Little B and Little Yang got along better and better, gradually becoming inseparable best friends. However, Little Yang never managed to start a romantic relationship, keeping his love a secret.
Oh, we just met and you're already talking so slick.
Ah, no, that's not true. Everything I'm saying is from the heart, hahaha.
Uh, okay then, I'll be going.
Little B feels that Little Yang isn't a sincere person and gradually distances herself from him.
Uh... 16 years old?
Wrong, keep guessing!
Then... 15 years old?
Nope, nope, guess again!
Forget it if you're not going to tell...
Little B feels that Little Yang is not an easy person to get along with and gradually distances himself from him.
